Uses of Interface
com.lambdaworks.redis.pubsub.StatefulRedisPubSubConnection

  • Packages that use StatefulRedisPubSubConnection 
    Package Description
    com.lambdaworks.redis
    The redis client package containing RedisClient for regular and sentinel operations.
    com.lambdaworks.redis.cluster
    Client for Redis Cluster, see RedisClusterClient.
    com.lambdaworks.redis.pubsub
    Pub/Sub connection classes.
    com.lambdaworks.redis.pubsub.api.async
    Pub/Sub Redis API for asynchronous executed commands.
    com.lambdaworks.redis.pubsub.api.rx
    Pub/Sub Redis API for reactive commands.
    com.lambdaworks.redis.pubsub.api.sync
    Pub/Sub Redis API for synchronous executed commands.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      StatefulRedisPubSubConnection<String,String> RedisClient.connectPubSub()
      Open a new pub/sub connection to a Redis server that treats keys and values as UTF-8 strings.
      <K,V> StatefulRedisPubSubConnection<K,V> RedisClient.connectPubSub(RedisCodec<K,V> codec)
      Open a new pub/sub connection to the Redis server using the supplied RedisURI and use the supplied codec to encode/decode keys and values.

      Open a new pub/sub connection to the Redis server using the supplied RedisURI and use the supplied codec to encode/decode keys and values.
      StatefulRedisPubSubConnection<String,String> RedisClient.connectPubSub(RedisURI redisURI)
